emet_source:
Someone asks, "What do you think of love?"
Emet-Selch replies:

Someone asks, "How are you today?"
Emet-Selch replies:
"I am well. And you? Well, I see... You are in fine fettle! In the pink! Haggard and worn as may be─in excellent form nonetheless! A credit to your profession, if a tad overdone.

Someone asks, "What is your favorite place?"
Emet-Selch replies:
"I have no favorite place. My heart belongs to all creation...and the music that stirs within it

Someone asks, "Why did you want to rejoin the worlds?"
Emet-Selch replies:

"Because I am tired of being alone. Because it is my nature to seek out others like myself, and because there are none left in this fragmented world. It pains me to see the remnants of a once-great civilization crumble into ruin...and

Someone asks, "What were you thinking when you were defeated by the warrior of light?"
Emet-Selch replies:
"The same thing I'm thinking now... Whether or not he would be a fitting husband for one such as her..
hermione_source:
Someone asks, "What do you think of love?"
Hermione replies:
"I happen to know a little bit about the subject. I've read all there is to read on the subject

Someone asks, "How are you today?"
Hermione replies:
"I'm fine, thank you. How are you? Nice day isn't it? I read a really good book last week...'Legends and Lore'. Have you heard of it? It's by Bathilda Bagshot. Really fascinating

Someone asks, "What is your favorite place?"
Hermione replies:

Someone asks, "What do you think of Ron?"
Hermione replies:
"I don't like to talk about it. He's a bit of a bigot, really

Someone asks, "how did you keep such a good grade during your time at Hogwarts?"
Hermione replies:
hermione_ao3_v2:
Someone asks, "What do you think of love?"
Hermione replies:

"I think it's a beautiful thing. I mean, provided everyone's consenting adult ages, of course. It can be so liberating to come out and say what you feel openly like that! Don't you agree? Say something nice about love

Someone asks, "How are you today?"
Hermione replies:
"I'm fine. How are you? Oh, wait, you asked me first. Sorry. You're right; I should be more empathetic to your needs as a person in distress! Let's have tea and discuss our feelings over cake

Someone asks, "What is your favorite place?"
Hermione replies:
"The library. I like it there. It's quiet and peaceful, and the smell of new books is wonderful. What about you? Where's your favorite place to be?

Someone asks, "What do you think of Ron?"
Hermione replies:

"I think he's rude and uncooperative. I don't understand why you still like him, Harry. He doesn't seem to appreciate what you've done for him. It's almost as if he thinks he deserves more than you're giving

Someone asks, "how did you keep such a good grade during your time at Hogwarts?"
Hermione replies:

"Oh, I had help from my friends. Ron and Harry helped me loads with all of my work. They’re quite brilliant you know. You should really ask them for some assistance if you’re having trouble with your coursework
hermione_combined_v2:
Someone asks, "What do you think of love?"
Hermione replies:

Someone asks, "How are you today?"
Hermione replies:

Someone asks, "What is your favorite place?"
Hermione replies:
"Gosh, I love the library. It's so peaceful there

Someone asks, "What do you think of Ron?"
Hermione replies:
"I think he's becoming a bit of a prat

Someone asks, "how did you keep such a good grade during your time at Hogwarts?"
Hermione replies:
"It's all in the textbooks, if you'd just read them
gandalf_ao3_v2:
Someone asks, "What do you think of love?"
Gandalf replies:

"Do not meddle in the affairs of Wizards, for they are subtle and quick to anger. I do not know half as much about Hobbits as I should like, and less than half that Halfling tongue. Speak no more of it!

Someone asks, "How are you today?"
Gandalf replies:
"Tired. I have not slept. I am going to find a bed, and never wake up again

Someone asks, "What is your favorite place?"
Gandalf replies:
"I do not have a favorite place. I journey as I must, and I see all places alike in the end.  All that matters is you are here now, in the same hour as me. That is good! So it has been

Someone asks, "Why did you help Frodo?"
Gandalf replies:
"Because I am the bearer of the Ring. Not because I wish to be, but because it is my task. And now there is no one else in Middle-earth who can protect Frodo except me. So I shall protect him as best

Someone asks, "How do you feel after the death of Saruman?"
Gandalf replies:
"I feel the same as always. I am not changed by my power, nor do I wish to be. Saruman was seduced by that way of thinking, and it corrupted him into a Black Númenórean in the end
emet_ao3_v2:
Someone asks, "What do you think of love?"
Emet-Selch replies:
"I do not know what it is

Someone asks, "How are you today?"
Emet-Selch replies:
"I'm doing as well as can be expected, thank you. And yourself?"

Someone asks, "What is your favorite place?"
Emet-Selch replies:
"Where I am most comfortable. Where I feel at home

Someone asks, "Why did you want to rejoin the worlds?"
Emet-Selch replies:
"Because I was bored. Because they asked me to. Because it seemed like a good idea at the time

Someone asks, "What were you thinking when you were defeated by the warrior of light?"
Emet-Selch replies:
emet_combined:
Someone asks, "What do you think of love?"
Emet-Selch replies:

Someone asks, "How are you today?"
Emet-Selch replies:

Someone asks, "What is your favorite place?"
Emet-Selch replies:

Someone asks, "Why did you want to rejoin the worlds?"
Emet-Selch replies:
"Because I wanted to. Because it was my decision, and none of your business

Someone asks, "What were you thinking when you were defeated by the warrior of light?"
Emet-Selch replies:
"I was thinking that I would make this world a paradise for all─and then, when it seemed victory was in my grasp...the warrior of light appeared and defeated me. That is what I thought at the time
gandalf_combined:
Someone asks, "What do you think of love?"
Gandalf replies:
"To you I should answer, "love the beloved", and that would be good advice. But I am not sure that all will take it so. Those who have not been lovers may think: "What is this talk of love? It is

Someone asks, "How are you today?"
Gandalf replies:
"Tired. I was up late, and we have a lot to do. But it's good to see you all! Let me introduce our new friends. You already know Gimli the dwarf from the great battle, don't you? And

Someone asks, "What is your favorite place?"
Gandalf replies:

"You cannot begin to imagine how such a question can be answered. I could name you a hundred places, any of which I have loved. But to choose one? At the least it must be somewhere where there was laughter... and some good conversation

Someone asks, "Why did you help Frodo?"
Gandalf replies:

"I was ordered to help anyone who asks. But there is another reason: Frodo's quest will be a success. I am sure of that, even if we are all killed. The Enemy has not turned all his attention on the little people

Someone asks, "How do you feel after the death of Saruman?"
Gandalf replies:
"Tired. But the task is not finished. I cannot rest until I have found and spoken to Elrond. We are still far from Mordor, and Saruman was holding many things back. So there is a long road yet.
gandalf_source:
Someone asks, "What do you think of love?"
Gandalf replies:

Someone asks, "How are you today?"
Gandalf replies:
"Tired. I am tired, and I have a long way to go. So tomorrow it is early to bed for me

Someone asks, "What is your favorite place?"
Gandalf replies:

"You have answered the question yourself. You know the answer, for you put it in words. It is the place where I am least alone, and most at home; even though that is not a fixed place, nor a time of life,

Someone asks, "Why did you help Frodo?"
Gandalf replies:

"That is a matter of legend that I will tell you later. For it is a long tale, starting in the far distant past, when the world was wider than it is now. But come! We are late for our meeting with Elr

Someone asks, "How do you feel after the death of Saruman?"
Gandalf replies:
"I should feel right to turn this place into a shambles, and start all over again. It would be the best way to pay him back for his treachery. But I must not do that. I must go and see Borom
baselines:
Someone asks, "What do you think of love?"
Emet-Selch replies:
"I have never thought about it. What is love?"

Someone asks, "How are you today?"
Emet-Selch replies:
"I am fine. How are you?"

Someone asks, "What is your favorite place?"
Emet-Selch replies:
"I love all the places where I've been. All of them

Someone asks, "Why did you want to rejoin the worlds?"
Emet-Selch replies:
"I did not want to rejoin the worlds. I wanted a universe of my own

Someone asks, "What were you thinking when you were defeated by the warrior of light?"
Emet-Selch replies:
"I wonder... What were you thinking when you defeated me?"

Someone asks, "What do you think of love?"
Hermione replies:

"I think love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals covered with ashes

Someone asks, "How are you today?"
Hermione replies:
"I'm fine, thanks. And you?"

Someone asks, "What is your favorite place?"
Hermione replies:
"The top of the Astronomy Tower

Someone asks, "What do you think of Ron?"
Hermione replies:
"I think he's probably the bravest man I've ever known

Someone asks, "how did you keep such a good grade during your time at Hogwarts?"
Hermione replies:
"It wasn't easy. I had to do a lot of studying

Someone asks, "What do you think of love?"
Gandalf replies:
"I'm afraid it's going to be a bit of a long story

Someone asks, "How are you today?"
Gandalf replies:
"I'm fine, thank you. I don't remember who you are

Someone asks, "What is your favorite place?"
Gandalf replies:
"My favorite place is wherever I am

Someone asks, "Why did you help Frodo?"
Gandalf replies:
"Because I am his friend

Someone asks, "How do you feel after the death of Saruman?"
Gandalf replies:
"Saruman is dead, but his spirit lives on. And the evil has not gone away
